profile.name: Aravindhan M
profile.title: Aspiring Software Developer & Data Analytics Enthusiast
profile.description: Passionate about building technical skills in software development and data analytics with hands-on experience in machine learning through internships and job simulations.
profile.about: Aspiring Software Developer with a strong interest in software development and data analytics. Passionate about building technical skills, learning new technologies, and contributing to innovative projects.
profile.aboutDescription1: I'm an aspiring software developer with a strong passion for technology and innovation. My journey began with exploring programming fundamentals in Python and Java, and has evolved into hands-on experience with machine learning through my internship at Global Techno Solutions.
profile.aboutDescription2: Currently building my foundation through practical experience and continuous learning, I focus on bridging the gap between theoretical data science and real-world application.

education.title: Computer Science and Engineering
education.institution: Sri Muthukumaran Institute of Technology, Chennai

experiences.title: Machine Learning Internship
experiences.description: Applied algorithms and data analysis skills in real-time tasks, developing analytical thinking crucial for software development. Worked directly with production data to optimize model performance and gained hands-on experience in the full ML lifecycle.

experiences.title: Data Analytics Job Simulation
experiences.description: Completed real-world scenarios simulating professional data analytics work. Analyzed client datasets to uncover trends and presented actionable insights using visualization tools.

experiences.title: Technology Consulting Job Simulation
experiences.description: Completed practical tasks in project kickoff, requirements gathering, application design, and creating agile stories. Tackled complex business and data analytics problems.

experiences.title: Web Development Internship
experiences.description: Successfully completed 15-day web development internship including project work. Performance during the internship was commended by the mentor.

certificates.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner Essentials
certificates.description: Completed comprehensive training on AWS Cloud fundamentals, services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.

certificates.title: Data Fundamentals
certificates.description: Successfully completed requirements for Data Fundamentals, covering essential data concepts, analysis techniques, and practical applications.

certificates.title: TCS iON Career Edge - Young Professional
certificates.description: Comprehensive course covering communication skills, presentation skills, soft skills, career guidance, resume writing, interview skills, business etiquette, and foundational IT skills.

certificates.title: Data Analytics Job Simulation
certificates.description: Completed practical tasks in data analysis and forensic technology. Certificate of Completion from Deloitte.

certificates.title: Technology Consulting Job Simulation
certificates.description: Completed practical tasks in project kickoff, requirements gathering, voting application design, and creating agile stories.

certificates.title: Web Development Internship Certificate
certificates.description: Successfully completed web development internship including project from 15th Feb 2024 to 8th March 2024 (15 days). Performance during the internship was commended.

content.experienceSubtitle: These experiences helped me bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical application, preparing me for real-world software development challenges.
content.certificatesSubtitle: Establishing credibility through continuous learning and formal mastery.
content.skillsSubtitle: A comprehensive overview of my technical capabilities and proficiency levels.
content.contactSubtitle: I bring fresh perspective, strong analytical skills, and a genuine passion for learning and growth in software development.
content.experienceQuote: I believe in learning by doing, which is why I've completed multiple job simulations with industry leaders like Deloitte Australia and Accenture.
